{{stack_data: id:$$id}}

h3. Stack: $$name
{{actions:
- display: Enable
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/computenode/enable
  data:
   name: $$name
   gid: $$gid
  input:
   - message

- display: Disable
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/computenode/disable
  data:
   name: $$name
   gid: $$gid
  input:
   - message

- display: Offline
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/computenode/setStatus
  data:
   name: $$name
   gid: $$gid
   status: OFFLINE
  input:
   - message
}}

* *ApiURL*: $$apiurl
* *Description*: $$descr
* *ReferenceId*: [$$gid:$$referenceid|/grid/Node?id=$$referenceid&gid=$$gid]
* *Status*: $$status
